segments.text: OK class , so today we are going to continue with our anatomy class , today we will review everything we have learned . Can anyone tell me what the first major organ is ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's right , the brain ! It serves as a control center for the body , handling the processes of the central nervous system as well as cognition . Then what major organ is in our chest ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Very good ! It pumps blood throughout the body , using the circulatory system such as blood vessels and veins . Now let's not forget that our lungs provide oxygen to our heart and body to keep us alive ! Now what about the organs that help us digest food ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Very good ! Let's not forget that the stomach is the one that breaks down our food and our intestines process that food and then expel the waste . Are we forgetting anything ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah ! Our kidneys , liver and bladder !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh yes , you are right . Very important organs indeed .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So what do these organs do , teacher ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , mumm , they ... Time for a break ! We can talk about it when you get back .
segments.speaker: S1
